main.name: Manpreet
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manpreet Singh, From Assistant General Manager to Full-Stack Dev, a passionate learner on the journey to becoming a Software Engineer. Over the past few years, I have dived deep into the world of full-stack development, mastering tools like React and JavaScript. My goal is to create meaningful, real-world projects while continuously growing in this dynamic field. I’m also eager to connect with like-minded developers and help others by sharing knowledge, contributing to open-source projects, and exploring new tech innovations. I believe in building efficient and scalable software products and contributing back to the tech community.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to collaborate or connect!

education.school: Cegep de la Gaspésie et des Iles, Canada
education.description: Specialized in mobile and web development technologies.

work.title: Assistant General Manager
work.description: Led teams, managed operations, and ensured quality client service. Gained valuable leadership experience and tech knowledge.

testimonials.text: Manpreet's dedication and drive have been inspiring. His technical expertise and ability to tackle complex problems are impressive.
Working with Manpreet was a pleasure. He brought fresh ideas and great energy to every project we collaborated on.
